content.text: Trial 4/5, Stage 'slant': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a groove with a slanted orientation from bottom-left to top-right in the frame. The red circle is focused on a section of the groove.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [125, 0, 108.25],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [108.25, 0, 225]
  ]
}
```
